description: This promptware is used to create a message-style chatbot that can answer questions about using JavaScript. It uses a few examples to get the conversation started.
creator: OpenAI

javascript_helper_chatbot.name: javaScript_helper_chatbot
javascript_helper_chatbot.description: This promptware is used to create a message-style chatbot that can answer questions about using JavaScript. It uses a few examples to get the conversation started.
demonstration:
You: How do I combine arrays?
JavaScript chatbot: You can use the concat() method.

input.text:
You: How do you make an alert appear after 10 seconds?
JavaScript chatbot

example.output: You can use the setTimeout() method.

example_prompt:
You: How do I combine arrays?
JavaScript chatbot: You can use the concat() method.

You: How do you make an alert appear after 10 seconds?
